title: New Ahri Skin and Alistar visual update in Patch 4.22. RIP NOSE RING AND MAN-SKIRT

replies.body: Nice, Ahri used to be my main for ages until I swapped to Heimy. I'll have to jump back on her and try out the new skin :)

Looks like someone at Riot discovered the colour red...

The Kalista, Elise, thresh, Rek' Sai, and Sejuiani skins.

I think they all look awesome, just funny that theres so many skins with red/pink as the main colour coming out

Alistar needs his nose ring back... the other skins look good without it, but his classic needs it back.
I welcome a visual update.  But unchained alis horns are way too small.
